comment: Main text block with vertical columns of Chinese characters, including title '說文解字第十五上' and content from Xu Shen's 'Shuowen Jiezi'. The text is arranged in traditional right-to-left format within a black border. Includes editorial notes such as '敕校定' and names like '銀青光祿大夫右散騎常侍上柱國東海縣開國子食邑五百戶徐鉉等奉'.
